description:
• In this course you will learn everything you need to know about Angular 2 to start writing your own web applications. 
  • You do not need to know Angular 1 or typescript to take this course. All you need is basic understanding of JavaScript and willingness to learn. Complete code samples will be available. 
  • I recommend you to type the code with me, to learn any new framework at a faster pace. If you just spend a Sunday afternoon or 15 minutes a day for 15 days you should be in a good shape to start writing your web application in Angular 2. 
  • Stay ahead of competition by learning Angular 2 when it's still new so your skills will be in demand when Angular 2 becomes popular as Angular 1 soon.
title: Angular 2 Fundamentals with TypeScript
